alert.note: Alert for Eastern Chittenden; Eastern Franklin; Lamoille; Orleans; Western Chittenden; Western Franklin (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Lamoille, southwestern Orleans, northeastern Chittenden and southeastern Franklin Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 300 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Jeffersonville Village, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Waterville, Johnson Village, Eden, Cambridge, Bakersfield, Cambridge Village, Montgomery Center, Johnson, Jeffersonville Village, Montgomery, Lowell, Belvidere Center, Craftsbury, Fletcher, Belvidere, Westfield, Albany Village, Hyde Park, Enosburg and Richford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for northeastern and northwestern Vermont.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Chittenden; Eastern Franklin; Lamoille; Orleans; Western Chittenden; Western Franklin
